## Overview

[@lumley_post-stratication_2008]

Post-stratification and calibration are: 

* ways to use auxiliary information on the population (or the phase-one sample) to improve precision
* closely related to the Augmented Inverse-Probability Weighted estimators of Jamie Robins et al.
